s.text: Even that much may not be true.
He says he had mixed feelings about being asked to serve as Gore's "security escort."
Fox News and in particular its Crossfire -style program Hannity and Colmes have been hyping the allegation that Al Gore had a "bodyguard" in Vietnam.
The Gore family has speculated that the Nixon administration wanted to make sure that Little Al didn't create good publicity for Big Al from Vietnam--possibly by getting injured.
